# sectionIdentifier(for:)

**Instance Method**

Returns an identifier for the section at the index you specify in the collection view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func sectionIdentifier(for index: Int) -> Any?
```

## Identifying sections

- **index(forSectionIdentifier:)**: Returns an index for the section with the identifier you specify in the collection view.

items.description: Returns an index for the section with the identifier you specify in the collection view.
items.name: index(forSectionIdentifier:)
